K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:8a-8: chags pa med pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:8a-9: thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:8a-11: byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa zhig 'dug pa de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:8a-13: sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su 'grub par bya ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:8a-14: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag rnams kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:8a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa de la chos kyi zhu ba zhu bar 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:8a-17: byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa des /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:8a-18: byang chub sems dpa' gang dag chos bstan pa de nyan cing 'du bar 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa dag phyogs bcu nas bsdu ba'i phyir /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:8b-0: snang ba chen po 'jig rten du @8b byung ba 'di'i rgyu ni de yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:8b-2: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:8b-3: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bsnyen bkur ba de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:8b-5: byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas nas 'od 'di lta bu 'gyed lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:8b-7: ting nge 'dzin kun du snang ba dri med bkod pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:8b-8: byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de ting nge 'dzin de la gnas nas 'od 'di lta bu 'gyed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:8b-11: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'di ltar gsal ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:8b-13: 'di ltar lus dang sems dga' ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:8b-14: mchog tu dga' bar bgyid pa'i 'od 'di lta bu 'gyed par mi mdzad lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:8b-17: byang chub sems dpa' bsdu ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:8b-18: byang chub sems dpa' bskul ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:8b-19: de nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:8b-20: sangs rgyas kyi zhing re re nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' dkrigs phrag bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:8b-21: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ga la ba der song ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:9a-0: lhags nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das @9a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:9a-1: de dag gi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:9a-2: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:9a-5: ma thos pa yon tan du ma dang ldan pa'i 'od 'di lta bu dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:9a-9: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:9a-10: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:9a-12: 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:9a-13: de na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:9a-14: 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:9a-15: de na byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa zhes bya ba zhig 'dug pa des 'di lta ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:9a-16: phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams bsdu ba'i phyir 'od 'bar ba 'di lta bu 'di bkye'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:9a-17: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:9a-18: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:9a-20: bdag cag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa de la blta ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:9b-0: zhu ba dang @9b zhu blag bgyi ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:9b-1: byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:9b-2: de las gzhan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag kyang blta ba'i slad du 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der mchi'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:9b-5: de'i dus la bab par shes na dengs shig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:9b-6: de nas de'i mod la phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' dkrigs phrag bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag skad cig thang cig yud tsam de nyid la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:9b-9: mi stobs po che'i lag pa bskum pa las brkyang ba'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:9b-10: brkyang pa las bskum pa tsam la rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag nas mi snang bar gyur nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir lhags par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:9b-11: de nas byang chub sems dpa' la la dag ni me tog gi char dag mngon par rab tu 'bebs shing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:9b-12: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa ga la ba der lhags so; ;la la dag ni phye ma dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:9b-21: aa ti mug ta ka dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:9b-26: b'a ra shi ka chen po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:9b-28: manda ra ba chen po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:10a-4: zla mdog rab mdzes la sogs pa me tog gi rigs rnam pa sna tshogs kyi char dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:10a-7: phye ma'i char dag mngon par rab tu 'bebs shing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:10a-8: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa ga la ba der lhags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:10a-9: byang chub sems dpa' la la dag ni sil snyan 'bum phrag du ma dag rab tu gsil zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:10a-10: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa ga la ba der lhags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:10a-11: byang chub sems dpa' la la dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la bstod pa'i sgra dbyangs re res kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su sgra skad kyis go bar 'byed cing lhags te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:10a-12: de lta bu'i bkod pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa ga la ba der lhags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:10a-13: byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir lhags ma thag tu de nas de'i mod la 'di lta ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:10a-14: byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sems can dmyal ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:10b-1: gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sems can gang ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad nye bar zhi bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:10b-2: sems can gang la yang 'dod chags kyis gnod pa med /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:10b-10: yongs su gdungs pas ma yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:10b-11: sems can thams cad byams pa'i sems dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:10b-12: mchog tu dga' ba'i sems dang ldan par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:10b-13: de nas byang chub sems dpa' dkrigs phrag bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:10b-14: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:10b-15: bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas steng gi bar snang la lus mi snang bar byas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:10b-16: lus thams cad rnam par 'jig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:10b-17: rang rang gi smon lam las byung ba'i padma kha dog sna tshogs 'dab ma 'bum phrag du ma dang ldan pa'i padma'i snying po dag la skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:11a-1: brtan 'od srung chen pos chos kyi cho 'phrul chen po ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba de dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:11a-4: phye ma'i char de dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:11a-5: sil snyan 'bum phrag mang po sgra 'byin pa de dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:11a-6: snang ba chen po de yang mthong /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:11a-7: gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di me tog dag gis pus mo nub tsam du khebs par gyur pa yang mthong /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:11a-16: mi dang mi ma yin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:11a-20: dge bsnyen ma de dag thams cad kyi lus gser gyi kha dog lta bur snang ba dag kyang mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:11a-21: de nas gnas brtan 'od srung chen po stan las langs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:11a-22: chos gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:11a-23: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:11a-24: bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:11a-25: rab dga' bde ba stsol ba shin tu dri ma med pa'i zhal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:11a-26: mi yi dam pa stobs bcu yon tan brgya dag nges bsags pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:11a-27: bsam yas gzhal du ma mchis yid gnyis mun pa sel ba po //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:11a-28: sa bla lha yul rnam par rgyu ba khyod dang mtshungs ma mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:11b-0: bskal pa khrag @11b khrig brgyar sbyin dang dul ba legs par spyad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:11b-1: bde gshegs khyod kyi tshul khrims mtshungs pa ma mchis gnas ma mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:11b-2: bzod stobs shin tu stobs dang ldan pa stobs bcu'i stobs ldan pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:11b-3: yon tan mnga' ba 'dzum mdzad bdag gi the tshom bsal du gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:11b-4: sems can sdug bsngal gzigs nas bskal pa brgya dag rnam spyad kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:11b-5: skyo zhing spong ba mi mnga' dgyes pa gzhal du ma mchis brnyes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:11b-6: sras dang sras mo btsun mo rgyal srid spyan dang sna tshogs btang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:11b-7: sbyin dgyes thams cad gtong ba bdag gi the tshom bsal du gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:11b-8: khyod kyis sngon chad chibs dang glang po shing rta dpung chung stsal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:11b-9: gtong la dgyes pas dbu dang na bza' khrag khrig brgya yang btang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:11b-10: thub pas zhal zas gtsang nan de bzhin pho brang dkor yang stsal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:11b-11: sbyin dang gtong la rtag tu dgyes pa bde gshegs khyed la zhu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:11b-12: stong pa'i chos rnams nges par bsten zhing thugs la legs dgongs pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:11b-13: rdul bral sku lus gtubs kyang sdug bsngal 'khrugs pa mi mnga' zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:11b-14: gsungs zhes zhus na bzod pa gsung ba'i stobs la brtson pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:11b-15: yon tan mnga' ba rdul dang bral ba khyod la zhu bar 'tshal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:11b-16: 'dod chags zhe sdang dag gis rab dkrugs rmongs shing kun dkris la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:11b-17: bdag tu 'du shes brtson pa'i sems can sdug bsngal gzigs nas ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:12a-0: thugs rje bskyed nas bskal pa brgya @12a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:12a-2: dpa' bo lam rab ston par mdzad pa bdag gi skyabs gyur cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:12a-3: bde gshegs legs pa mdzad pa khyod ni 'gro la thogs mi mnga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:12a-4: spyad pa legs par spyad pas rdzu 'phrul zhabs dang ye shes brnyes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:12a-5: bdag dang sems can rnam par bshig cing stong pa'i chos la brtson //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:12a-6: shin tu dri ma ma mchis bsam bsgom bdag gi the tshom khum //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:12a-7: khyod kyis sngon ni sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod pa brtson 'grus dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:12a-8: bsam gtan shes rab snying rje byams pa mtshungs pa ma mchis bsten //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:12a-9: khyod kyis yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab chu 'dzin rgya mtsho bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:12a-10: 'byung gnas bzang po shin tu gnas pa bdag gi skyabs gyur cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:12a-11: rdul bral khyod kyi sku lus dum bu dum bur bcad cing ni; ;srang la bcal ba mdzad cing dam dum lhag grol ma lus par //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:12a-12: sku kun ril gyis btang ste phug ron phrug gu gcig ma btang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:12a-13: rdul bral 'od mdzad thugs rje mnga' ba the tshom gcad du gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:12a-14: lha tshogs gnas pa'i ri bo g-yos shing dgung ni rdib gyur la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:12a-15: lha ma yin gyi tshogs kyi gnas mal rgya mtsho bas gyur cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:12a-16: mkha' la gnas shing rgyu ba'i dgung zla dog sar lhung gyur kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:12a-17: rgyal ba grags pa mdzad pa khyod ni log pa'i tshig mi gsung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:12b-0: de nas gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis @12b mngon par bstod nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:12b-1: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:12b-3: snang ba chen po 'jig rten du byung zhing ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i mtshan ma rgya chen po 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di'i rgyu ni gang lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:12b-5: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:12b-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:12b-8: 'di lta bu'i gtam dris pas khyod la ci zhig bya'i thong zhig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:12b-9: 'di ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sa ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:12b-10: gal te de bzhin gshegs pas gnas 'di bstan par gyur na lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'di la rmongs shing bslad par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:12b-13: de bzhin gshegs pas skye bo mang po la sman pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:12b-14: skye bo mang po la bde ba'i slad du bshad du gsol /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:12b-15: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:12b-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:12b-18: de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la gzung zhig dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:12b-20: gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis ltar mnyan pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:12b-21: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:12b-23: 'di na 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa kun du snang pa dri med bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:13a-0: de'i mthus phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gangg'a'i klung bye ba'i bye ma snyed dag @13a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:13a-2: 'od des phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' dkrigs phrag bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med grangs med /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:13a-3: bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang dag par bskul te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:13a-4: 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir lhags nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:13a-5: de dag gis da gzod nga'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag byas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:13a-6: nga la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:13a-7: steng gi bar snang la ta la srid tsam na padma dgal 'khod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:13a-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:13a-10: byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi mthus; me tog gi char 'di lta bu 'di dag rab tu bab cing spos kyi char dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:13a-11: phye ma'i char 'di dag kyang rab tu bab la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:13a-12: sil snyan 'bum phrag mang po dag kyang ma dkrol bar sgra 'byin lags sam; bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:13a-15: byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi mthus me tog gi char 'di lta bu 'di dag rab tu bab cing spos kyi char dag dang; phye ma'i char 'di dag kyang rab tu bab la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:13a-16: sil snyan 'bum phrag mang po dag kyang ma dkrol bar sgra 'byin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:13a-19: 'di na byang chub sems dpa' 'ga' yang mi gda'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:13a-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:13a-22: de dag ni nyan thos rnams dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:13a-23: rang sangs rgyas dag gis blta bar mi nus so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:13b-2: rang sangs rgyas rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying rje chen po gang dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:13b-3: byams pa chen po gang dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:13b-5: spyod pa gang la gnas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:13b-6: byang chub sems dpa' rnams sbyin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:13b-11: shes rab gang la gnas pa de la mi gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' gang la spyod pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa de la yang mi spyod pa'i phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:13b-13: byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni lus thams cad rnam par 'jig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pas de dag ni nyan thos rnams dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:13b-14: rang sangs rgyas dag gis blta bar mi nus te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:13b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis gzigs pa kho nar zad do; ;'od srung /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:13b-16: rigs kyi bu de dag ni 'di ltar sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:13b-17: theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang re zhig mi mthong na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:13b-19: rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis mthong bar 'gyur ba lta ci smos te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:13b-21: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:13b-22: bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:13b-24: byang chub sems dpa' chos du dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:14a-0: dge ba'i rtsa ba ji lta bu dag dang ldan na byang chub @14a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:14a-1: sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin lus thams cad rnam par 'jig pa thob par 'gyur lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:14a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:14a-4: byang chub sems dpa' chos bcu dang ldan na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:14a-5: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin lus thams cad rnam par 'jig pa thob par 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:14a-7: lhag pa'i bsam pa la yang dag par 'jug pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:14a-8: sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:14a-9: snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:14a-10: mtshan ma thams cad rnam par 'jig pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:14a-11: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la lhag par dmigs shing de la rlom sems med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:14a-12: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la lhag par dmigs pa med cing de las ye shes yongs su tshol ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:14a-13: lus dang srog kyang yongs su gtong na dngos po gzhan dag lta ci smos te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:14a-14: bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:14a-15: tshogs dpag tu med pa yongs su 'dzin cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:14a-16: tshogs des rlom sems med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:14a-22: shes rab dpag tu med pa yongs su rdzogs par byed cing pha rol tu phyin pa de dag la rtog pa med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:14a-23: bdag gis sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyis chos rnams la bkod nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:14b-0: phyis byang chub kyi shing drung du 'gro bar @14b bya'o snyam yang sems can rnams dang byang chub mi dmigs pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:14b-2: byang chub sems dpa' chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:14b-3: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin lus thams cad rnam par 'jig pa thob par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:14b-4: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:14b-5: bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:14b-7: ji tsam du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:14b-8: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pas nam yang sems 'ga' yang ma bskyed pa'i legs par gsungs pa gsung ba ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:14b-11: bdag gis sems can thams cad dgra bcom pa nyid kyi chos rnams la yang dgod par bgyi na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:14b-12: sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la lta smos kyang ci 'tshal lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:14b-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:14b-15: de lta bas na nyan thos dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:14b-16: rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi ni lus thams cad rnam par 'jig pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par mi nus te; ting nge 'dzin de'i ming yang mi shes na snyoms par 'jug par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te de ni gnas med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:14b-17: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:14b-18: bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:14b-20: bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' de dag blta bar bgyi'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:14b-21: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:15a-1: lta bu de dag mthong bar dka' ba'i slad du'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:15a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:15a-4: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'ongs kyi bar du khyod re zhig sdod cig dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:15a-5: de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag ting nge 'dzin de las ldang zhing de'i 'og tu mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:15a-7: de lta mod kyi khyod nyid ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi gnas thob pa yin gyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:15a-8: byang chub sems dpa' de dag spyod lam ji lta bus gnas par rtogs shig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:15a-9: de nas gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:15a-10: byang chub sems dpa' de dag spyod lam ji lta bus gnas pa blta ba'i phyir de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:15a-11: rang gi stobs bskyed pas ting nge 'dzin nyi khri la snyoms par zhugs shing rnam par langs kyang de dag ma mthong ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:15a-12: byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi 'ong ba dang 'gro ba yang ma shes /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:15a-13: de dag gi gnas dang rab tu gnas pa yang ma shes /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:15a-15: ci ston pa dag kyang thams cad kyis thams cad du ma shes /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:15a-17: de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:15a-19: 'di ltar bdag ting nge 'dzin nyi khri la snyoms par zhugs kyang byang chub sems dpa' de dag ma mthong ba ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:15b-0: shin tu ngo mtshar @15b lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:15b-2: byang chub sems dpa' de dag da dung thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob par de ltar zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin bsgrubs pas kyang de lta lags na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:15b-3: byang chub sems dpa' gang dag thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob pa dag lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:15b-6: rigs kyi bu mo su zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par mi bgyid /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:15b-8: gal te byang chub sems dpa' lus thams cad rnam par 'jig pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di nyid kyi slad du go cha 'tshal bar bgyid pa de ni; go cha legs par 'tshal ba lags pas ting nge 'dzin 'di ni slad kyis kyang yongs su gtang bar mi bgyi'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:15b-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:15b-12: ji skad smras pa de bzhin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:15b-13: 'di ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sa yang ma yin na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:15b-14: sems can gzhan dag gi lta smos kyang ci dgos /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:15b-15: de nas gnas brtan sh'a ri'i bu 'di snyam du sems te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:15b-16: bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab can rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa yin gyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:15b-17: byang chub sems dpa' de dag spyod lam ci lta bus gnas pa bdag gis brtag par bya'o snyam mo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:15b-18: de nas gnas brtan sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' de dag blta ba'i phyir /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:15b-19: ting nge 'dzin sum khri la snyoms par zhugs shing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:16a-0: rnam par langs kyang de dag gi @16a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:16a-1: mtshan ma yang shes par ma nus so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:16a-2: de nas gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di snyam du sems te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:16a-3: bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag blta bar bya'o snyam mo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:16a-4: de nas gnas brtan rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' de dag blta ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:16a-6: ting nge 'dzin bzhi khri la snyoms par zhugs shing rnam par langs kyang de dag gi 'ong ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:16a-11: nyal ba yang ma mthong ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:16a-12: de dag blta bar ma nus so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:16a-13: de nas gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:16a-14: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:16a-16: bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pas nyon mongs pa ma mchis par gnas pa rnams kyis mchog tu bstan te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:16a-17: bdag zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin rnams thob pa lags pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:16a-19: bdag gal te gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnga bo che'i sbubs gcig tu gyur cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:16a-20: gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gcig shos kyang rnga bo che'i sbubs gcig tu gyur la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:16a-21: der mi la la zhig skyes nas der ri rab tsam gyi rnga shing thogs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:16a-22: bdag ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu mdun du mchis nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:16b-0: sug las gzhan mi bgyid par bskal pa'i bar du rgyun mi 'chad @16b par rnga bo che de gnyis brdungs par gyur kyang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:16b-2: bdag nyon mongs pa ma mchis par gnas pa'i slad du de ltar bsgrubs te zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin rnams thob pa la re zhig bskal pa 'das par gnas pa'i rnga bo che de gnyis kyi sgra de dag bdag gi rna ba'i rnam par rig pa tsam du yang grags par mi 'gyur na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:16b-3: des ting nge 'dzin de las bslangs pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:16b-4: de ni gnas ma mchis lags na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:16b-5: bcom ldan 'das nyon mongs pa ma mchis par gnas pa de lta bu dang ldan zhing ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:16b-6: byang chub sems dpa' de dag blta ba'i slad du ting nge 'dzin bzhi khri la snyoms par zhugs shing rnam par langs kyang de dag ma mthong ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:16b-7: de dag gi gnas kyang mi 'tshal lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:16b-9: gal te byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes de lta bu yongs su tshol ba na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:16b-10: sems can re re'i slad du bskal pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed du sems can dmyal ba chen por bsreg par gyur kyang spro bar bgyi zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:16b-12: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa de lta bu yongs su gtang bar mi bgyi'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:16b-14: gal te bdag len pa ma mchis par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol bar ma gyur na ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:16b-15: bdag slad ma'i mtha'i mur thug par 'khor bar spyod cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:16b-16: de lta bu'i theg pa chen po yang yongs su spong bar mi bgyid do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:17a-1: kyis gnas brtan rab 'byor la legs so zhes bya ba byin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:17a-2: rab 'byor khyod kyis lhag pa'i bsam pa de lta bus tshig de skad smras pa legs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:17a-4: khyod gal te phung po 'di dag nyid kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar ma gyur du zin na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:17a-6: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal srid gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed byed du 'jug cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:17a-7: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:17a-9: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag mang ba yin nam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:17a-18: gal te sems can de dag thams cad dge slong rab 'byor dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:17a-20: 'od srung chen po ci 'dra ba de lta bu'i shes pa dang ldan par gyur la; rab 'byor /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:17a-21: nyan thos chen po de lta bu de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' de dag blta ba'i phyir /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:17a-22: bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mar brtags kyang mthong bar mi nus so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:17a-26: rang sangs rgyas rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos gang dag la spyod pa de dag la mi spyod pa'i phyir te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:17b-2: rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnas ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:17b-4: lha dang mi'i skye dgu rnams las srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:17b-5: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gnas 'di nyid na 'dug pa 'di snyam du sems te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:17b-6: byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po 'di dag 'dus kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:17b-7: bdag gis lha 'bum phrag mang po dag kyang bsdu bar bya'o snyam mo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:17b-8: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de'i tshe /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:17b-9: ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du byas na 'di lta bur 'gyur ba'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba 'dus byas pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:17b-13: snying po ni rin po che dpal gyi snying po /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:17b-14: ze ba ni be d'urya las byas pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi mngon par sprul cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:17b-15: padma de dag la byang chub sems dpa'i lus gser gyi kha dog lta bu /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:17b-16: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:17b-20: 'od gsal ba dag pa padma'i snying po dag gi dbus na skyil mo krung gis 'dug pa'i lus gzugs dag kyang mngon par sprul to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:17b-21: de nas padma de dag rgyal chen bzhi'i lha'i ris nas bzung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:18a-17: bsod nams skyes dang; 'bras bu che dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:18a-22: 'og min gyi lha'i ris kyi bar dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:18a-23: de bzhin du stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i rgyal chen bzhi'i lha'i ris ther 'bum nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:18a-24: 'og min gyi lha'i ris kyi bar 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:18a-25: gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas ji snyed pa thams cad du 'dong zhing sgra sgrogs par byed /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:18a-27: yang dag par skul bar byed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:18a-28: byang chub sems dpa'i lus gzugs de dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na rnam par rgyu ba'i tshe /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:18a-29: tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:18a-30: sangs rgyas nyi ma'i rtsa lag rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:18a-32: au dum wa ra'i me tog ltar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:18a-33: sangs rgyas de bzhin shin tu dkon //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:18a-34: sh'akya seng ge mi yi mchog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:18a-36: sdug bsngal thams cad zad byed pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:18b-0: chos ni yang dag @18b de stan mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:18b-1: lha yi 'dod pa yi dga' la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:18b-2: ji snyed yun ring spyad byas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:18b-3: gang du tshor ba myong gyur pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:18b-5: ji srid 'dod pa rnams bsten pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:18b-6: sred pa phyir zhing rab tu 'phel //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:18b-7: khams gsum 'khor ba'i srog chags la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:18b-8: bde ba yod pa ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:18b-9: sangs rgyas 'byung ba rab dkon dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:18b-10: khom pa dam pa rnyed nas ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:18b-11: gang dag bdag med mi rtogs pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:18b-12: de dag sdug bsngal zad mi 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:18b-13: sangs rgyas blta pa'i phyir deng la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:18b-14: chos kyi dam pa mnyan par gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:18b-16: phyis dus 'gyod par ma byed cig; mi rnams gang dag rtag myos shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:18b-17: 'jigs chen bdud kyi zhags pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:18b-18: bag med spyod par byed rnams la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:18b-19: thar pa yod par ga la 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:18b-20: da ni 'di skad smra bar bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:18b-21: bsod nams byas pa'i sems can gang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:18b-22: sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan mnga' ba'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:18b-23: rdzogs sangs rgyas dang myur phrad byos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:18b-24: gang dag byams pa bsam yas pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:18b-25: 'jig rten mgon rnams ma gtogs par //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:18b-26: sems can rnams kyi skyabs gzhan med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:18b-27: dpung gnyen gzhan yang yod ma yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:18b-28: skyob pa sh'akya seng ge yis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:18b-29: tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:18b-30: bskal pa bye bar spyad mdzad nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:18b-31: ye shes dam pa brnyes nas ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:18b-32: gang la sems can mi dmigs shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:18b-33: srog dang gang zag yod min pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:18b-34: chos mchog zhi ba zab mo dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:19a-2: rtag pa dang ni de bzhin du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:19a-3: chad pa'ang rab tu spangs gyur cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:19a-4: mtshan ma thams cad spangs pa'i chos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:19a-5: srog chags rnams la ston par mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:19a-6: gang la 'jig rten mi gnas pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:19a-7: stong nyid mtshan ma med pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:19a-8: smon pa byed pa ma yin pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:19a-9: yang dag mtha' ni rab tu ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:19a-10: rtags med mtshan ma yod min zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:19a-11: skye med 'byung ba med pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:19a-13: chos ni mkhas pa ston par mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:19a-14: zag med 'byung ba yod min zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:19a-15: rang bzhin gyis ni dngos med dang; ;bltar med mtshan ma yod min pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:19a-16: ston dang rlom pa'i sems mi mnga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:19a-17: sems can gang yang skye med cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:19a-19: mya ngan 'das pa'ang gang yang med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:19a-20: sems can 'byung ba'ang yod ma yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:19a-21: skad kyis chos rnams bstan byas kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:19a-22: skad la brten pa yod min zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:19a-23: yi ge rnams dang bral ba'i chos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:19a-24: mi yi 'dren pa ston par mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:19a-25: gang la rlung ni mi gnas shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:19a-26: chu dang me yang mi dmigs la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:19a-27: sar yang rtog pa med pa'i chos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:19a-28: spyan dang ldan pa ston par mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:19a-29: gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:19a-30: 'du byed rnams dang rnam shes ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:19a-31: stong zhing phung po lnga po dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:19a-32: dngos po med pa ston par mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:19a-33: mig dang rna ba sna dang ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:19b-0: lce dang lus dang de bzhin @19b yid; ;rang bzhin stong par ston mdzad kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:19b-1: stong pa de yang dmigs su med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:19b-2: gzugs dang sgra dang dri rnams dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:19b-3: ro dang reg bya yid 'ong ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:19b-4: de dag rnam par rtog pas bskyed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:19b-5: rtog pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:19b-6: de ltar sangs rgyas skyob pa ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:19b-7: srog chags rnams la chos ston gyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:19b-8: gang dag sdug bsngal thar 'dod pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:19b-9: de dag rnams 'dren drung du shog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:19b-10: de nas byang chub sems dpa'i sprul pa de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis chos bstan pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:19b-12: gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams las lha bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:19b-13: lha'i bu khri nyis stong gis ni 'dod chags dang bral brjas [*ba rjes?] su thob bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:19b-14: lha'i bu sa ya phrag gsum dang nyis 'bum ni byang chub tu sems skyes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:19b-15: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i lha'i bu khris ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:19b-16: de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i lus gzugs de dag gis /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:19b-17: lha'i bu gang dag yang dag par bskul ba de dag las /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:19b-18: lha'i bu 'bum phrag dpag tu med grangs med pa dag skad cig thang cig yud tsam cig gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa ga la ba der dong ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:20a-1: nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:20a-2: bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:20a-4: lha'i me tog autpa la dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:20a-8: manda ra ba chen po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:20a-11: byug pa dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par gtor to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:20a-12: steng gi bar snang la yang lha'i glu dbyangs mang po dag rab tu len par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:20a-13: de'i tshe na gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir gang du lha'i bu gzi brjid che ba; gzi brjid che ba dag gis khyab par ma gyur pa'i sa phyogs tha na 'khar ba gzugs pa'i gtod tsam yang med pa de snyed kyi lha'i bu dag 'dus par gyur cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:20a-14: gling chen po bzhi ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang me tog dag gis pus mo nub tsam du khebs par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:20a-15: de nas lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:20a-18: lha'i bu ngo tsha shes pa'i nor can zhes bya ba lha bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug po thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa sha stag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:20a-19: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i gnas ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:20b-0: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i gnas kyi phyi rol nas @20b lan bdun bskor ba byas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:20b-1: me tog manda ra ba'i char dag mngon par rab tu phab bo /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:20b-2: me tog manda ra ba'i char de dag gis /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:20b-3: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i gnas su me tog gi phung po 'phang du dpag tshad bcu pa kun nas gnas par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:20b-4: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byin gyis brlabs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:20b-5: ci lta bu byin gyis brlabs na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:20b-6: 'di lta bur 'gyur ba'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:20b-7: stong gsum gyis stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i steng gi bar snang la me tog gi dra ba kun nas bkram par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:20b-8: me tog gi 'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di kun tu khyab par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:20b-9: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa rang gi gnas nas byung ste smon lam las byung ba'i stan la 'dug go ;de nas lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:20b-10: lha'i bu de dag thams cad kyis kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs so ////
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:20b-12: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di snyam du sems te /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:22a-35: sems par mi byed pa de dang /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:22b-5: sems par mi byed pa ste /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:22b-8: mi mnyam pa ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:22b-9: lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas kyis smras pa /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:22b-15: ci rung rnam par ma rtog cig /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:22b-17: byang chub kyang dmigs su med do //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:23b-0: mtshan ma rnams la rtog par mi @23b byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:23b-1: sangs rgyas kyi zhing bkod pa rnams la rtog par mi byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:23b-2: nyan thos kyi dge 'dun phun sum tshogs pa la rtog par mi byed cing rtog pa thams cad las ldog ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:23b-4: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' gang de las ldog pa de ni mi ldog pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:23b-10: sangs rgyas kyi ye shes las mi ldog go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:23b-11: stong pa nyid las mi ldog go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:23b-12: mtshan ma med pa las mi ldog go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:23b-13: smon pa med pa las mi ldog go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:23b-14: de bzhin nyid las mi ldog go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:23b-15: chos kyi dbyings las mi ldog go; yang dag pa'i mtha' las mi ldog go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:23b-16: mnyam pa nyid las mi ldog go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:23b-19: de skad ces byang chub sems dpa' gang rtog pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:23b-20: rnam par rtog pa dang; yongs su rtog pa'i chos de dag las ldog pa des na ldog pa zhes bya'o zhes gsungs pa de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:23b-21: ci gang dag las ldog pa'i chos de dag mchis pa zhig gam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:23b-22: 'on te ma mchis pa zhig gam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:23b-23: 'on te mchis pa dang ma mchis pa zhig gam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:23b-24: 'on te mchis pa yang ma lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:23b-25: ma mchis pa yang ma lags pa zhig lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:23b-28: gang dag las ldog pa'i chos de dag ni yod pa yang ma yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:23b-30: yod pa dang med pa yang ma yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:23b-31: yod pa yang ma yin med pa yang ma yin pa yang ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:24a-6: yang dag pa ma yin par 'dzin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:24a-7: legs pa ma yin par 'dzin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:24a-8: log par 'dzin pa gang yin pa de 'dzin par mi byed /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:24a-9: yongs su gtong bar mi byed /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:24a-10: mtshan mar mi byed pa de'i phyir ldog pa zhes byas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:24a-11: de ni yod par yang bstan par mi bya /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:24a-12: med par yang bstan par mi bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:24a-14: gal te yod pa dang med pa las ldog par gyur na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:24a-15: de ni skyon du gyur pa'i phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:24a-17: gal te yod pa las ldog par gyur na rtag par 'gyur la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:24a-18: med pa las ldog par gyur na chad par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:24a-19: de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtag pa dang chad pa'i phyir chos ston par mi mdzad de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:24a-20: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos bstan pa ni rtag pa'i phyir yang ma yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:24a-21: chad pa'i phyir yang ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:24a-23: de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni sngon ma byung bar gyur pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:24a-24: zhes 'du shes kyis yod pa ma yin par yongs su shes par zad kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:24a-25: de la ni chad pa yang med /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:24a-28: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ldog pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:24a-29: bstan pa 'di bshad pa na lha'i bu khris mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:24a-30: de nas lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:24b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:24b-4: zhu ba dang zhu blag bgyi ba'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar bzhud kyi gshegs so; ;'jam dpal gyis smras pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:24b-5: lha'i bu rnam par rtog pa la ma spyod cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:24b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa de ni kho bos blangs zin to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:24b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa de gang na bzhugs /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:24b-12: de ni kho bo'i mdun na bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:24b-17: lha'i bu; gal te khyod kyis thams cad mthong na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:24b-18: des de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar mi 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:24b-21: ci slad du de skad ces de bzhin gshegs pa de ni kho bos blangs zin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:24b-22: de ni kho bo'i mdun na bzhugs so zhes gsung /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:24b-26: kho bo'i mdun zhes bya ba ci zhig yin snyam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:24b-32: de bzhin gshegs pa de yang 'di lta ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:24b-35: chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i phyir nam mkha' ji lta bu yin pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:24b-36: de bzhin gshegs pa yang de lta bu yin pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:25a-0: nam mkha' dang de bzhin gshegs @25a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:25a-1: pa de ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med pa'i phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:25a-3: de lta bas na khyod de bzhin gshegs pa blta bar 'dod na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:25a-4: mtha' 'di khong du chud par bya zhing cung zad kyang rnam par brtag par mi bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:25a-5: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:25a-6: de'i tshe khang pa brtsegs pa gru bzhi lham pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:25a-7: ka pa bzhi pa cha mnyam pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:25a-10: blta na sdug pa sum khri nyis stong mngon par sprul to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:25a-11: khang pa brtsegs pa de dag tu rin po che'i khri stan lha'i dpag bsam shing las byung ba'i gos kyis bshams pa dag kyang sprul cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:25a-12: khri stan re re la yang byang chub sems dpa'i lus gzugs skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa dag sprul to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:25a-13: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas; ci lta bu'i byin gyi rlabs nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:25a-14: 'di lta bur 'gyur ba'i byin gyis brlabs pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:25a-15: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ni rnam par spyod pa'i padma gang dag yin pa de dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:25a-16: khang pa brtsegs pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:25a-17: bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la lan gsum bskor ba byas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:25a-18: steng gi bar snang la bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la snang bar byed cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:25a-19: phyogs bzhi kun nas 'khor bar 'khod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:25b-0: de nas padma de dag la @25b 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sprul pa gang dag yin pa de dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:25b-1: khang pa brtsegs pa dag na 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das la sgra dbyangs mthun par tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:25b-2: gangg'a'i bye snyed bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:25b-3: sangs rgyas bye ba phrag mang khyod kyis mchod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:25b-4: byang chub mchog gi spyod pa btsal mdzad pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:25b-5: de slad mi mchog khyod ni mdzes pa lags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:25b-6: thub pa mtshan gyis yongs su spras gyur pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:25b-7: sku mchog srid pa gsum na lhang nge ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:25b-8: 'dren pa gang la ming dang srog dang ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:25b-9: gang zag ma mchis chos ni 'gro la ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:25b-10: rnam par 'dren pas sbyin dang tshul khrims spyad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:25b-11: bzod dang brtson 'grus de bzhin bsam gtan bsten //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:25b-12: khyod kyis shes rab srid gsum thogs mi mnga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:25b-13: ye shes mthar byon khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:25b-14: gang zhig chos rje lha dang mis mchod pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:25b-16: stong pa nyid la mos par bgyid pa yi; ;mi de 'jig rten dag gi 'dren par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:25b-17: gang dag sngon byung de bzhin gshegs pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:25b-18: gang dag phyogs rnams bzhugs pa'i 'dren pa dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:25b-19: de dag gis ni mtshan med stong pa'i chos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:25b-20: rang bzhin mtshan nyid ma mchis rtag tu bsgoms //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:25b-21: 'di la rang bzhin sems can gang yang ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:25b-22: skye dang 'chi ba dmigs su ma mchis shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:26a-2: chos rnams thams cad nam mkha' ji bzhin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:26a-3: ci ltar mi yis sgyu ma bstan gyur pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:26a-4: snang yang de bzhin nyid du ma mchis ltar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:26a-5: de bzhin chos rnams sgyu ma 'dra ba dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:26a-6: rmi lam lta bur bde bar gshegs pas bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:26a-7: gang zag la las gangg'a'i bye snyed kyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:26a-8: 'jig rten khams rnams 'dir ni sbyin byas dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:26a-9: 'dus byas stong par bzod pa gang lags pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:26a-10: bzod pa de ni sbyin las khyad par 'phags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:26a-11: byang chub 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:26a-12: bskal pa bye ba gangg'a'i bye snyed du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:26a-13: me tog spos dang de bzhin zas skom dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:26a-14: phul nas mi mchog sangs rgyas mchod pa bas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:26a-15: gang gis gang la ming dang srog dang ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:26a-16: gang zag ma mchis de 'dra'i chos 'di dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:26a-17: thos nas de la 'od gsal bzod thob pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:26a-18: de yis mi rnams dam pa mchod pa lags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:26a-19: gang la ming dang gang zag 'du shes mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:26a-20: bskal pa bye ba mang por zas skom dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:26a-21: shing rta dpung chung khri stan sbyin bgyid kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:26a-22: des ni 'gro ba grol bar mi thob bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:26a-23: mi mchog gang dag mya ngan 'das pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:26a-24: de dag gis kyang sems can ma bkrol ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:26a-25: mkhas rnams rang bzhin 'od gsal stong pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:26a-26: chos rnams de ltar mkhyen pas rnam par grol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:26a-27: sangs rgyas 'byung dang yul du gnas pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:26a-28: de bzhin bstan la dad pa thob pa dka'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:26b-0: @26b mi yi srid pa'ang rnyed par dka' bas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:26b-1: rgyal ba rnams kyi bstan la legs brtson gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:26b-2: mi khom brgyad po thams cad rnam spangs shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:26b-3: khom pa phun sum rnyed dka' thob 'gyur la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:26b-4: bde gshegs bstan la dad pa rnyed gyur pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:26b-5: mkhas pa rnams kyis rig pa'i rnal 'byor spyod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:26b-6: sgra la 'chel zhing 'dug par ma byed par //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:26b-7: chos thos gyur nas rtag tu nan tan gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:26b-8: khyed kyis rtag tu dgon pa'i gnas brten la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:26b-9: des ni mi rnams dam par 'gyur bar byos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:26b-10: chos smra'i dge bshes gang yin bsten gyis la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:26b-11: sdig pa'i grogs la lan 'ga'ang ma bsten cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:26b-12: sems can kun la sems ni mnyam gyis la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:26b-13: sems can de la nam yang ma rloms shig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:26b-14: tshul khrims ldan dang mang du thos gyis la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:26b-15: rtag tu phyag dar khrod dang bsod snyoms spyod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:26b-16: g-yel ba med par shing drung bsten gyis la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:26b-17: bskus te bor ba mchog la ma smod cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:26b-18: 'dus byas 'di dag thams cad 'dus byas min //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:26b-19: mtshan nyid gcig cing smig rgyu 'dra ba yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:26b-20: dam pa'i don gyi mu gcig shes gyis la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:26b-21: myur du gzhal yas byang chub reg par gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:26b-22: phung po lnga rnams sgyu ma bzhin du ltos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:26b-23: nang gi skye mched drug dang phyi yi drug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:26b-24: de dag grong stong 'dra bar gsungs pas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:26b-25: de la nam yang bsten par ma byed cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:26b-26: 'dod chags zhe sdang rang bzhin stong pa nyid //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:26b-27: gti mug nga rgyal yongs su rtog pas bskyed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:27a-2: de ltar shes na 'dren pa rnams su 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:27a-3: de nas sprul pa de dag gis tshigs su bcad pa de dag smras pa na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:27a-4: 'khor de las srog chags nyi khri nyis stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:27a-5: dge slong lnga brgya ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:27a-6: dge slong sum brgya ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:27a-7: dge slong ma sum stong yang chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:27a-10: lha'i bu nyi khri bdun stong yang chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:27a-11: byang chub sems dpa' sum brgyas ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:27a-12: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g-yos te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:27a-21: kun tu rab tu ldeg go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:27a-22: de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan sh'a ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:27a-24: gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu g-yos pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:27b-0: byang @27b chub sems dpa'i lus gzugs pad ma dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:27b-1: khang pa brtsegs pa 'di dag na mchis pa 'di rnams chos zab mo 'di lta bu ston par bgyid pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:27b-2: 'khor 'di yang snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:27b-3: lha'i bu bye ba phrag 'di snyed 'dus pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:27b-4: byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag mang po 'dus pa 'di dag su'i mthu lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:27b-5: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:27b-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan sh'a ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:27b-8: 'di ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i mthu yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:27b-9: des bkod pa 'di lta bu 'di dag kun du snang ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:27b-12: 'di ltar deng de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas dang lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:27b-13: bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'jig par byed pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs zhu zhing zhu blag byed par 'gyur pa'i phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:27b-14: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:27b-15: bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:27b-17: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de 'khor 'dus pa 'di na mi gda'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:27b-18: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:27b-19: sh'a ri'i bu khyod re zhig sdod cig dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:27b-20: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:28a-2: bdud kyi gnas thams cad dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:28a-3: bdud thams cad zil gyis gnon cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:28a-4: bkod pa chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der 'ong bar 'gyur ro //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:47b-3: sar yang rnam par rtog par mi byed /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:47b-5: sa yongs su spong bar yang mi byed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:47b-8: byang chub las ldog par yang mi 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:47b-10: chos thams cad gzod ma nas rnam par dag pa'i phyir /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:47b-13: skye mched kyi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de ni 'pho ba med cing 'jig pa med pa'i phyir te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:47b-15: de ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa nas sar 'phar ba yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:47b-19: sgyu ma mkhan zhig gis sa bcu'i khang pa brtsegs pa zhig mngon par sprul nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:47b-20: der sgyu ma'i mi zhig zhugs par gyur na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:47b-23: der zhugs pa 'ga' yang yod snyam mam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:47b-29: byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcur 'phar ba yang de bzhin du blta bar bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:47b-30: de nas lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:47b-32: la la zhig rab tu 'byung ba'i slad du khyod kyi thad du mchis na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:47b-33: rab tu 'byung ba de la khyod ji skad gsung zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:47b-34: de rab tu ni ji ltar 'byin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:47b-35: de bsnyen par rdzogs par ni ji ltar mdzad /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:48a-0: tshul khrims kyi phung po la ni ji @48a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:48a-2: bslab pa'i lung ni ji skad 'bogs par mdzad /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:48a-5: la la zhig rab tu 'byung ba'i phyir /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:48a-6: kho bo'i thad du 'ongs na; de la kho bo 'di skad ces rigs kyi bu gal te khyod rab tu 'byung ba'i sems bskyed par mi byed pa de lta na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:48a-7: kho bos khyod rab tu dbyung ngo zhes smra'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:48a-10: gang rab tu 'byung ba de ni 'dod pa'i khams su gnas pa'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:48a-11: gzugs kyi khams su gnas pa'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:48a-12: gzugs med pa'i khams su gnas pa'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:48a-13: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la gnas pa yin la; gnas dgu la spyod pa'i rigs kyi bu ni chos mngon sum du byed pa'i phyir te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:48a-16: gang ci la yang mi gnas pa de ni sems nye bar dmigs par mi byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:48a-17: sems nye bar dmigs par mi byed pa de ni rab tu 'byung bar mi 'dod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:48a-18: gang rab tu 'byung bar mi 'dod pa de ni rab tu 'byung ba'i sems bskyed par mi byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:48a-19: gang rab tu 'byung ba'i sems bskyed par mi byed pa de ni mi skye ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:48a-20: gang mi skye ba de ni sdug bsngal zad pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:48a-21: gang sdug bsngal zad pa de ni gtan zad pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:48a-22: gang gtan zad pa de ni mi zad pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:48a-23: gang mi zad pa de ni zad par mi 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:48a-24: gang zad par mi 'gyur ba de ni nam mkha' yin pa ste /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:48b-0: gzhan @48b yang la la zhig rab tu 'byung ba'i phyir kho bo'i thad du 'ongs na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:48b-1: de la kho bo 'di skad ces rigs kyi bu khyod rab tu 'byung ba'i sems ma bskyed cig /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:48b-4: de rnam par ma dkrugs shig /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:48b-8: 'jam dpal khyod ci las dgongs te de skad ston /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:48b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa ni gcad du med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:48b-12: dbyer med pa'i phyir chos ston par mdzad do //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:48b-23: rnam par shes pa ni gcod par mi byed cing 'byed par mi byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:48b-25: gang 'di snyam du bdag gis skra breg go snyam du sems pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:48b-26: ngar 'dzin pa dang nga yir 'dzin pa la gnas pa yin pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:48b-28: nga yir 'dzin pa la spyod pa dag gis ni mnyam pa nyid mi mthong zhing /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:49a-2: gang la gzhan du dmigs pa med pa de la ngar 'dzin pa med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:49a-3: gang la ngar 'dzin pa med pa des nga yir 'dzin pa spangs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:49a-4: gang gis nga yir 'dzin pa spangs pa de rnam par mi rtog go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:49a-5: gang rnam par mi rtog pa de mi 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:49a-6: gang mi 'gyur ba de ni spros pa med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:49a-7: spros pa med pa de mi len /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:49a-24: rab tu rjod par mi byed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:49a-25: de ni yang dag pa la gnas pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:49a-27: yang dag pa zhes bgyi ba ci lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:49a-30: gang yang dag pa zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:49a-35: de'i phyir nam mkha' de ni yang dag pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:49a-36: yang dag pa ni stong pa nyid do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:49a-37: yang dag pa ni de bzhin nyid do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:49a-38: yang dag pa ni chos kyi dbyings so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:49a-39: yang dag pa ni yang dag pa'i mtha'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:49a-40: yang dag pa gang yin pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:49b-0: de ni ma byung zhing 'byung bar mi @49b 'gyur bas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:49b-1: de'i phyir de ni ma byung ba yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:49b-3: gzhan yang la la zhig rab tu 'byung ba'i phyir kho bo'i thad du 'ongs na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:49b-4: de la kho bos 'di skad ces rigs kyi bu gal te khyod ngur smrig 'dzin par mi byed cing gyon par mi byed pa de lta na khyod rab tu dbyung ngo zhes smra'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:49b-6: 'jam dpal khyod ci las dgongs te /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:49b-10: 'dzin pa'i phyir ni ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:49b-14: 'jam dpal gyis smras pa; lha'i bu /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:49b-15: gzugs rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya bar mi 'dzin to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:49b-19: rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya bar mi 'dzin to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:49b-37: mdor na chos thams cad mi 'dzin /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:50a-1: 'dzin pas ni rnam par dag pa'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:50a-2: rnam par grol bar mi 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:50a-5: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub ni snyigs ma med pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:50a-8: snyigs ma zhes bgyi pa ci lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:50a-19: lhag par 'dzin pa ni snyigs ma'o //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:50a-24: gang snyigs ma med pa de ni ci yang med pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:50a-25: gang ci yang med pa de ni nyon mongs pa med pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:50a-26: gang nyon mongs pa med pa de ni nam mkha' yin no //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:50a-30: lhag par bya ba med pa zhes bgyi na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:50a-32: lhag par bya ba med pa zhes bgyi ba ci lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:50a-35: lhag par bya ba med pa /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:50b-0: gang dag lhag par byed pa de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa lhag par bya ba med pa zhes gsungs @50b te; de ni lhag par bya ba med pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:50b-6: mnyam pa nyid las 'da' bar byed cing /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:51a-5: mi gti mug can de dag rtog par bya ba'i chos la sgro 'dogs shing yongs su rtog par byed de /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:51a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa la lhag par bya ba med pa ston par mdzad do //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:51b-21: gzugs med pa'i khams su ltung ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:51b-24: nye bar len par ltung ba ste /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:51b-27: sdig pa'i grogs po rnams kyi log tu ltung ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:51b-28: nges par 'byung ba mi shes shing yongs su 'dzin pa thams cad yongs su 'dzin par byed pa gang yin pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:51b-30: mi mnyam par rdzogs par bsnyen pa yin no;/
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:51b-31: de la mnyam par rdzogs par bsnyen pa gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:51b-32: gang mnyam pa nyid du 'bab pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:51b-33: de la mnyam pa nyid gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:51b-34: stong pa nyid mnyam pa nyid dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:51b-35: mtshan ma med pa mnyam pa nyid dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:51b-36: smon pa med pa mnyam pa nyid de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:52a-0: rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po de dag mngon sum du bya ba yang dag pa ji lta @52a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:52a-1: ba bzhin bsgrub cing rtog pa med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:52a-2: rnam par rtog pa med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:52a-3: kun du rtog pa med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:52a-4: phyir mi ldog pa gang yin pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:52a-6: mnyam par rdzogs par bsnyan pa yin no //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:52a-9: zhe sdang sel bar byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:52a-10: gti mug sel bar byed pa dang /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:52b-2: ji ltar sman rnams rnam par 'phel ba la rdzogs pa zhes bya ba de bzhin du tshul khrims dang dad pa la brten pa'i byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos thams cad skye zhing rdzogs par 'gyur te /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:52b-8: gang de ltar rdzogs par bsnyen par byed pa ni yang dag par rdzogs par bsnyen par byed pa yin gyi mi mnyam par ma yin no //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:52b-12: khyod bslab pa 'dod pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:52b-13: zhes rjes su bstan pa sbyin par bya'o //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:52b-25: so sor thar pa'i sdom pa gang lags pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:53a-0: @53a *// so sor thar pa'i sdom pa yang gang yin /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:53a-13: byed par mi 'gyur ba'i las gang yin pa de la sngon po'am /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:53a-28: de ni lus kyi las sam /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:53a-34: gang mngon par 'du bya ba med pa de blang bar nus snyam mam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:53a-40: de'i phyir kho bo ni de las bsams nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:53a-41: de skad ces gang bslab pa len par mi byed pa de bslab pa 'dod pa yin no zhes ston to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:53a-43: lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi bslab pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:53b-0: lhag @53b pa'i sems kyi bslab pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:53b-1: lhag pa'i shes rab kyi bslab pa zhes bya ba gang yin pa de yang mtha' de nyid kyis rtogs par bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:53b-2: tshul khrims mi dmigs pas lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi bslab pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:53b-3: sems mi dmigs pas lhag pa'i sems kyi bslab pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:53b-4: shes rab mi dmigs pas lhag pa'i shes rab kyi bslab pa zhes bya'o //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:53b-7: rnam par rtog pa med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:53b-8: skye ba med pas lhag pa'i sems kyi bslab pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:53b-9: tshul khrims rtog pa med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:53b-11: rnam par rtog pa med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:53b-12: skye ba med pas lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi bslab pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:53b-13: shes rab rtog pa med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:53b-15: rnam par rtog pa med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:53b-16: skye ba med pas lhag pa'i shes rab kyi bslab pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:53b-18: gang gis sems ma rnyed pa de tshul khrims su rlom sems mi byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:53b-19: gang tshul khrims su rlom sems mi byed pa des ting nge 'dzin mi dmigs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:53b-20: gang gis ting nge 'dzin mi dmigs pa des shes rab mi dmigs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:53b-21: gang gis shes rab mi dmigs pa de la the tshom thams cad mi 'byung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:53b-22: gang la the tshom thams cad mi 'byung ba de bslab pa mi len to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:53b-23: gang bslab pa mi len pa de bslab pa 'dod pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:53b-24: gang bslab pa 'dod pa de phyir mi 'ong ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:53b-25: gang phyir mi 'ong ba de rnam par dag pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:53b-26: gang rnam par dag pa de bral ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:54a-0: gang bral ba de zag pa med @54a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:54a-1: pa'o; ;gang zag pa med pa de yang dag par zhugs pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:54a-2: gang yang dag par zhugs pa de la bcos pa med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:54a-3: gang la bcos pa med pa de nam mkha'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:54a-5: nam mkha' ni bcos pa med pa'i phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:54a-7: gang de ltar slob pa de ni slob par mi byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:54a-8: gang slob par mi byed pa de ni slob par byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:54a-10: ci la yang mi slob ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:54a-11: gang gi tshe ci la yang mi slob pa de ni yang dag pa'i bslab pa la gnas pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:54a-12: gzhan yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas la 'di skad ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:54a-14: de ltar rab tu byung zhing de ltar rdzogs par bsnyen pa de la kho bo 'di skad ces /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:54a-16: gal te khyod stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi dad pas byin pa yongs su longs spyod par byed cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:54a-17: yongs su sbyong bar mi byed pa de lta na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:54a-18: khyod tshul khrims yongs su dag pa yin no zhes smra'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:54a-20: 'jam dpal khyod ci las dgongs te de skad ston /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:54a-23: gang len par byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:54a-24: bde bar byed pa de ni sbyong bar byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:54a-25: gang dmigs par byed pa de ni sbyor bar byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:54a-26: gang rlom sems su byed pa de ni sbyong bar byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:54a-27: gang rtog par byed pa de ni sbyong bar byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:54a-29: gang len par mi byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:54a-30: bde bar mi byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:54b-0: dmigs @54b par mi byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:54b-1: rlom sems su mi byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:54b-2: rtog par mi byed pa de ni ci yang sbyong bar mi byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:54b-4: de ni gtan dag pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:54b-6: de lta bas na so so'i skye bo rnams ni dad pas byin pa sbyong bar byed kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:54b-7: dgra bcom pa dag ni ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:54b-9: so so'i skye bo rnams ni len par byed /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:54b-14: bdag ni len pa yin no snyam du rtog par byed /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:54b-15: 'di ni sbyin par byed pa yin no snyam du rtog par byed pas de dag ni sbyong bar byed pa yin pa'i phyir te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:54b-16: de ji ltar sbyong bar byed ce na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:54b-17: srid pa'i 'gro bar skye ba 'grub par byed cing der sbyong bar byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:54b-19: dgra bcom pa dag ni srid pa gzhan du rtogs pa'i lus gzhan 'ga' yang 'grub par mi byed pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:54b-20: de dag ni ci la yang sbyong bar mi byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:54b-21: de dag bsod snyoms de len pa na yang 'khor gsum yongs su dag pas len to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:54b-23: 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa de yang gang zhe na; len par byed pa'i bdag gang yin pa yang mi dmigs /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:54b-24: sbyin par byed pa'i sbyin pa po gang yin pa yang mi dmigs /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:54b-25: blang bar bya ba'i bsod snyoms gang yin pa yang mi dmigs pa ste; lha'i bu /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:54b-26: de ni 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:54b-28: gang de ltar dag pa de ni yang sbyor bar mi byed pas na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:55a-0: kho bo ni de las bsams nas 'di skad ces gang stong @55a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:55a-1: gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyis dad pas byin pa yongs su longs spyod par byed cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:55a-2: yongs su sbyong par mi byed pa de ni 'jig rten na sbyin gnas kyi 'os yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:55a-3: de ni legs par rab tu byung ba yin no zhes ston to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:55a-4: gzhan yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas la 'di skad ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:55a-6: de ltar rab tu byung zhing de ltar rdzogs par bsnyen pa de la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:55a-9: gal te khyod dgon par mi gnas shing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:55a-15: skye bo mang po'i dbus su ma yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:55a-18: bsod snyoms spyod par yang mi byed /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:55a-20: phyag dar khrod par yang mi byed /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:55a-23: bla gab med par yang mi byed /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:55a-24: 'dod pa chung bar yang mi byed /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:55a-25: 'dod pa che bar yang mi byed /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:55a-26: chog shes par yang mi byed /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:55a-27: chog mi shes par yang mi byed /
