K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:55a-29: rab tu mi dben par yang mi byed /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:55a-30: shing drang bar yang mi byed /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:55a-31: gnas khang du yang mi gnas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:55a-32: sman bkus te bor ba yang mi bsten /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:55b-0: sbrang rtsi @55b yang mi bsten cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:55b-2: gal te khyod sbyangs pa'i yon tan gyi chos de lta bu thams cad yang dag par blangs te 'jug par mi byed pa de lta na khyod sbyangs pa dang ldan pa yin no zhes smra'o; ;de ci'i phyir zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:55b-4: gang 'di snyam du bdag ni phyag dar khrod pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:55b-7: bdag ni sman bkus te bor bas chog shes pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:55b-11: bdag ni bla gab med pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:55b-12: bdag ni sbyangs pa dang ldan pa'o snyam du sems pa de dag ni mngon pa'i nga rgyal can gyi rnam par g-yo ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:55b-14: yang dag par zhugs pa la ni lhag par g-yo ba dang bral bar g-yo ba de dag mi 'byung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:55b-16: 'di ltar de la rnam par rtog pa med pas bdag nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:55b-17: sbyangs pa'i yon tan rnams su dmigs pa lta ci smos te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:55b-18: de ni gnas med pa'i phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:55b-20: de lta bas na gang sbyangs pa'i yon tan de dag yang dag par blangs te 'jug cing rlom sems su mi byed /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:55b-21: rnam par rtog par mi byed pa de ni sbyangs pa dang ldan pa yin no zhes kho bo smra'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:55b-24: dge slong gang 'dod chags sbyong ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:55b-28: phung po rnams sbyong ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:55b-30: nang gi skye mched drug dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:56a-1: mched drug po de dag sbyong bar byed cing ci nas kyang mi len /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:56a-5: rnam par mi sel ba de ltar sbyong bar byed pa de ni sbyangs pa dang ldan pa yin no zhes kho bo smra ba'i phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:56a-7: gzhan yang de ltar rab tu byung zhing de ltar rdzogs par bsnyen pa de la kho bo 'di skad ces /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:56a-9: gal te khyod bden pa bzhi rtogs par mi byed /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:56a-10: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yang mi bsgom /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:56a-11: yang dag par spong ba bzhi yang ma yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:56a-12: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yang ma yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:56a-13: dbang po lnga yang ma yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:56a-15: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yang ma yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:56a-16: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang mi sgom zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:56a-17: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yang mi sgom /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:56a-19: rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum yang mi sgom /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:56a-20: mngon sum du mi byed pa de lta na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:56a-21: khyod byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams bsgom pa yin no zhes smra'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:56a-24: de ni mi skye ba'i mtshan nyid rtogs pa zhes bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:56a-25: de ni bsgom par byar med cing mngon sum du byar med pa'i phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:56a-27: mi skye ba ni mngon sum du byar mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:56a-29: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad dran pa med cing yid la bya ba med pas de'i phyir dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:56b-0: dge slong gang 'dod pa'i @56b khams la yang mi gnas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:56b-1: gzugs kyi khams la yang mi gnas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:56b-2: gzugs med pa'i khams la yang mi gnas pa de ni gnas med pa la gnas ba'i dge slong dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bsgom pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:56b-4: ci nas sgom par mi byed /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:56b-5: 'jig par mi byed pa de ltar sgom par byed pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:56b-6: de'i phyir sgom par byed pa zhes bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:56b-7: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun po thams cad la yang de bzhin du sbyar ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:56b-9: gang gi tshe dge slong rnal 'byor pa rnal 'byor spyod pas chos thams cad mi dmigs pa de'i tshe na rlom sems su mi byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:56b-10: gang gi tshe rlom sems su mi byed pa de'i tshe sgom par mi byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:56b-11: gang gi tshe sgom par mi byed pa de'i tshe mngon sum du mi byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:56b-14: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni ming tsam ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:56b-15: ming de yang g-yo ba med pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:56b-17: mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:56b-20: ming gis yongs su shes pa gang yin pa de dmigs su med pa'i phyir te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:56b-21: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yongs su shes pa gang yin pa de ni bden pa pa mthong ba yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:56b-24: rnal 'byor pa rnal 'byor spyod pa zhes bgyi na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:56b-25: ji ltar na dge slong rnal 'byor spyod pa lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:57a-1: gang gi tshe rnal 'byor spyod pa 'di lta ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:57a-2: chos thams cad skye ba med pa'i tshul gyis tshul gcig tu sbyor bar byed na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:57a-3: de'i phyir rnal 'byor spyod pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:57a-4: gang gi tshe ci la yang mi spyod na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:57a-5: de'i phyir rnal 'byor spyod pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:57a-6: ci la mi spyod ce na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:57a-8: chos thams cad yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir 'jig rten 'di la mi spyod /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:57a-9: 'jig rten pha rol la mi spyod /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:57a-10: khams gsum la mi spyod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:57a-11: de'i phyir rnal 'byor spyod pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:57a-13: gang gi tshe rnal 'byor spyod pa chos 'ga' yang sbyor bar mi byed /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:57a-14: 'byed par mi byed na de'i phyir rnal 'byor spyod pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:57a-15: de nas 'khor de las dge slong stong phrag mang po dag 'di snyam du /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:57a-16: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum rtogs pas mya ngan las 'da' ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:57a-17: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun mngon sum du byas pas mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa de 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'dis bkag par gyur na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:57a-18: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bstan pa 'di ji ltar rung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:57a-21: snyam du the tshom gyi sems skyes par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:57b-0: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur bas dge slong de dag gi sems kyi yongs @57b su rtogs pa sems kyis shes nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:57b-1: gnas brtan sh'a ri'i bu la smras pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:57b-2: btsun pa sh'a ri'i bu khyod ni de bzhin gshegs pas yid ches pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:57b-4: shes rab chen po rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa yin na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:57b-6: gang gi tshe khyod kyis 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos rnams mngon sum du byas pa'i tshe /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:57b-7: btsun pas bden pa bzhi po dag dmigs pa'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:57b-10: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:57b-11: rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po dag dmigs pa'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:57b-13: bsgom pa ci yang yod dam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:57b-17: gang mngon sum du bya ba'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:57b-19: rtogs par bya ba'i chos de ni 'ga' yang dmigs su med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:57b-21: chos thams cad ni blang du med pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:57b-23: rnam bar rig pa med pa /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:68b-15: 'gyod pa dag ni rnam par bsal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:68b-16: chos rnams rang bzhin stong pas na //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:68b-26: mtshon cha rnon po thogs nas ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:68b-27: sangs rgyas ga la bzhugs par brgyugs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:68b-28: sangs rgyas ci bzhin mtshon de bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:68b-29: de dag gnyis ka mtshan nyid gcig /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:69a-1: zhing gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag rnam pa drug tu rab g-yos shing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:69a-2: sa chen po g-yos pa yang 'jig rten du byung bar gyur to //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:69a-5: bcom ldan 'das gang gis dog sa chen po g-yos pa 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba 'di su'i mthu lags /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:69a-10: 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed de na byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa zhig 'dug pa des /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:69a-12: byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag 'dul ba'i dbang gis phyir shes rab kyi ral gri'i mtshon rnon po thogs te /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:69a-14: de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi shes rab kyi mtshon las brtsams te /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:69b-16: sgyu ma'i skyes bu las gang du rnam par smin par 'gyur ba der kho bo'i yang rnam par smin par 'gyur ro //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:70a-22: 'jam dpal khyod kyi bsams pa des bstan pa ltar na /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:70a-25: chos thams cad las med pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-001:70a-26: rnam par smin pa med pa'i phyir ro //
